results.name: Triangle read by rows in which row n lists the first 2^n terms of A323642, n >= 1.
example: Written as an irregular triangle in which the row lengths are the terms of A000079 multiplied by 2 the sequence begins:
It appears that the right border gives A008776.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Mar 03 2019
